snippet.title: RollMe - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
RollMe is a physical-based platform puzzle game, where you can roll over 120 levels in 6 different places. Your ball can change the direction of gravity and you can use jumpers, teleporters to complete levels soon as you can. You can earn points when you collect consumables and finish the levels in a shorter time. Every act has new challenges and riddles. 
Prepare yourself and add the game to your wishlist on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1749120/RollMe/

Follow us on Facebook to get the latest updates or visit http://www.infinityscoregames.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/InfinityScoreGames
